description:
When you find yourself facing criminal charges in Centralia, Illinois, Crain, Miller & Wernsman, Ltd. stands ready, willing and able to be your criminal defense law firm. Established in 1939, the attorneys in our law firm have deep experience representing clients in the various Southern Illinois municipal, state and federal courts.

Whether charged with a felony or a misdemeanor, our law firm can provide you with competent and aggressive representation in the following areas:

• DUIs
• Major traffic violations
• Major moving violations
• Commercial driver's license infractions
• Juvenile law

We can also help you with expungement of a prior criminal conviction.

The attorneys in our law firm realize, however, that criminal charges are not the only kind of legal problem that can turn your life upside down. We therefore have the flexibility to meet your needs in the following areas as well:

• Personal injury and workers' compensation
• Real estate law
• Estate planning and administration
• Business and corporate law
• General civil law

When you come to Crain, Miller & Wernsman, Ltd. for your free initial consultation, you will find a group of seasoned attorneys who have decades of real-world experience and courtroom ability. You will also find us approachable, easy to talk to and genuinely concerned about you and the legal problem you face. In addition, we offer virtual appointments and accept all major credit cards for payment of our eminently reasonable and highly competitive legal fees.
